overview.summary: This module builds an octree based texture with leaves that are a power of cubed that is designed to be used for OpenGL volume rendering.

description.p: The brick size option allows testing and or the use of older graphics hardware. The maximum brick size allowed by the hardware should be used.

Select auto scale or fixed scale for mapping the colors in the transfer function to the data. The auto scale option gathers the minimum and maximum data values, then maps the colors in the transfer functions linearly to this range. The fixed scale option allows the user to enter the minimum and maximum values for the linear mapping.
Currently, only the TextureVolVis and the TexCuttingPlanes modules use the texture produced by this module
